alert.note: Alert for Natrona (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 20 at 6:11PM MDT until June 20 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN NATRONA COUNTY... At 611 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Goldeneye Reservoir, which is also 20 miles northwest of Casper, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bar Nunn, Homa Hills, Antelope Hills, Goldeneye Reservoir and Casper-Natrona County International Airport. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 194 and 206. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
